sn22.116:1.2: Ekamantam nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn22.116:1.4: kittavata nu kho, bhante, dhammakathiko hoti;
sn22.116:1.5: kittavata dhammanudhammappatipanno hoti, kittavata ditthadhammanibbanappatto hoti”ti?
sn22.116:1.6: “Rupassa ce, bhikkhu, nibbidaya viragaya nirodhaya dhammam deseti, ‘dhammakathiko bhikkhu’ti alamvacanaya.
sn22.116:1.7: Rupassa ce, bhikkhu, nibbidaya viragaya nirodhaya patipanno hoti, ‘dhammanudhammappatipanno bhikkhu’ti alamvacanaya.
sn22.116:1.8: Rupassa ce, bhikkhu, nibbida viraga nirodha anupadavimutto hoti, ‘ditthadhammanibbanappatto bhikkhu’ti alamvacanaya.
sn22.116:1.12: vinnanassa ce, bhikkhu, nibbidaya viragaya nirodhaya dhammam deseti, ‘dhammakathiko bhikkhu’ti alamvacanaya.
sn22.116:1.13: Vinnanassa ce, bhikkhu, nibbidaya viragaya nirodhaya patipanno hoti, ‘dhammanudhammappatipanno bhikkhu’ti alamvacanaya.
sn22.116:1.14: Vinnanassa ce, bhikkhu, nibbida viraga nirodha anupadavimutto hoti, ‘ditthadhammanibbanappatto bhikkhu’ti alamvacanaya”ti.
